thread.title: Sherifa Elkhadem
thread.title_full: David Sklar & Associates Inc. reviewed by Sherifa Elkhadem

author: Sherifa Elkhadem
title: Sherifa Elkhadem
text: By far the best professional experience I have ever had. Cori Naron is the best professional I have ever encountered in my life. She is beyond caring and considerate. Her attention to every detail and her kind and thoughtful manner made a very difficult situation so much easier. She is a blessing during a very hard time and if not for her, I do not thing I would have been able to weather the situation at all. Cori is a real gem!
